title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Alt-Coins - Buyers Beware, Bullish Sentiment Broken, IRS Weighs In
description: Wednesday’s violent cryptocurrency capitulation has shattered this year’s bull surge and the market may take a long time to recover if it recovers at all
